participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easygoing, Jake enjoys engaging in light-hearted conversations.
participant_1.background: Jake grew up in a small town and has a passion for outdoor activities and socializing with friends.

participant_2.background: Ella comes from a multicultural family and has traveled extensively, which has shaped her open-minded outlook.
